Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-52533 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-52533 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.71.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-52533
